message: Hi Bob, I'm offering this great product to you for $95. I think you'll find it's a fantastic deal!
Hello Alice, thank you for the offer. I appreciate it, but I think I can find a better deal elsewhere. I am willing to pay up to $85 for the product.
Thanks for the offer, Bob. I understand your position, but I can't go lower than $90.  This product is in high demand and I'm confident it's worth every penny.
Hello Alice, I appreciate your response. Considering the current market and my budget, I am willing to pay up to $87 for the product. I hope we can come to an agreement.
